parameters.name: StudentId
parameters.description: Absent student.

parameters.name: LessonId
parameters.description: Lesson of absence.

parameters.name: DateFrom
parameters.description:
Beginning of the range for absence date. The {DateFrom} parameter
determines date to get absence data from, as well as the school year period

parameters.name: DateTo
parameters.description:
End of the range for absence date.
The {DateTo} parameter must be within the same school year as {DateFrom}

parameters.name: OnlyAbsenceReports
parameters.description:
Only retrieve reports of absence or partial absence,
defaults to false (retrieve everything)

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return (1 is the first page).

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: Number of objects per page.

parameters.name: InlineCount
parameters.description: A flag indicating if total number of items should be included.

parameters.name: SchoolCode
parameters.description: The school code for which to get data.

parameters.name: SubjectCoursesActiveOnOrAfterDate
parameters.description:
Subject courses must be active on the date or after this date
This parameter is required

parameters.name: LmsIndicator
parameters.description:
Is the entity to be created in the LMS.
If not specified, then the value of the LMS indicator is disregarded in the filtering.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return (1 is the first page).

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: Number of objects per page.

parameters.name: InlineCount
parameters.description: A flag indicating if total number of items should be included.

parameters.description: Activities start on or after this date

parameters.name: PeriodTo

parameters.description: The number of the page to return (1 is the first page).

parameters.name: PageSize

parameters.name: InlineCount
parameters.description: A flag indicating if total number of items should be included.

parameters.name: SchoolCode
parameters.description: The school code for which to get data.

parameters.name: PeriodFrom
parameters.description:
Beginning of period for activity report quarters.
The {PeriodFrom} parameter must be a date that is on or before given activity report period
to include the desired report in the output.
E.g. if specifying PeriodFrom as 2021-01-01 and PeriodTo as 2021-06-30
you will only get the activity report for 2nd period of 2021 (March 16 to June 15)

parameters.name: PeriodTo
parameters.description:
End of period for activity report quarters. The {PeriodTo} parameter must fully encompass
the end date of a given activity report quarter to include the desired report in the output.
E.g. to get all activity reports for 2020 the PeriodFrom could be 2019-12-15
and PeriodTo could be 2020-12-30

parameters.name: SchoolCode
parameters.description: The school code for which to get data.

parameters.name: PeriodFrom
parameters.description: Includes reports for periods with a transmission period start date no earlier than {PeriodFrom}

parameters.name: PeriodTo
parameters.description: Includes reports for periods with a transmission period start date no later than {PeriodFromTo}

AbsenceRegistrationsExternalRequest.title: AbsenceRegistrationsExternalRequest
AbsenceRegistrationsExternalRequest.description: Returns a paged list of absences satisfying provided criteria.

dateFrom.title: Date
dateFrom.description:
Beginning of the range for absence date. The {DateFrom} parameter
determines date to get absence data from, as well as the school year period

dateTo.title: Date
dateTo.description:
End of the range for absence date.
The {DateTo} parameter must be within the same school year as {DateFrom}

onlyAbsenceReports.description:
Only retrieve reports of absence or partial absence,
defaults to false (retrieve everything)

pageNumber.title: Int32
pageNumber.description: The number of the page to return (1 is the first page).

inlineCount.title: Boolean
inlineCount.description: A flag indicating if total number of items should be included.

schoolCode.title: String
schoolCode.description: The school code for which to get data.

level.title: String
level.description:
The level indicator, 
e.g. A, B, 1, 2, -.

description.title: String
description.description:
Description of the level, 
e.g. A, Begynder, Niveau 1, Uden niveau.

levelType.title: String
levelType.description:
The type of the level.
TEGN = Characters, TAL = Numbers,
ERHVERV, FGU almen, FGU-tema, Delmål.

startDate.description: Possible start date of UVM subject

endDate.description: Possible end date of UVM subject

canOverwriteDuration.title: Boolean
canOverwriteDuration.description: Is it possible to have a locally defined duration of this subject

durationInDays.description:
Possible duration of subject in days. 
This is used for EUD. 
Can be null. In this case look at Programmes.Host.ExternalApi.SubjectCourses.Queries.SubjectCourses.UVMSubjectDetails.DurationInHours

durationInHours.description:
Possible duration of subject in hours. 
This us used for Adult Education Center (VUC)
Can be null. In this case look at Programmes.Host.ExternalApi.SubjectCourses.Queries.SubjectCourses.UVMSubjectDetails.DurationInDays

levelDetails.description:
Detailed information about the level the subject
is taken on.

If the lesson otherwise is using custom start and end time, the SchoolHourEntryId will be null (this is the default of most of the partnering time table systems)

periodFrom.description:
Beginning of period for activity report quarters.
The {PeriodFrom} parameter must be a date that is on or before given activity report period
to include the desired report in the output.
E.g. if specifying PeriodFrom as 2021-01-01 and PeriodTo as 2021-06-30
you will only get the activity report for 2nd period of 2021 (March 16 to June 15)

periodTo.title: Date
periodTo.description:
End of period for activity report quarters. The {PeriodTo} parameter must fully encompass
the end date of a given activity report quarter to include the desired report in the output.
E.g. to get all activity reports for 2020 the PeriodFrom could be 2019-12-15
and PeriodTo could be 2020-12-30

Takes another value if the report is supplementary

status.description: Status of the report. Should be the string equivalent of the Report Status Enum

activityReportsRows.description: List of data rows in the report

schoolCode.description: The school code for which to get data.

SubjectCoursesExternalRequest.title: SubjectCoursesExternalRequest
SubjectCoursesExternalRequest.description: Returns a paged list of subject courses satisfying provided criteria.

startDateFrom.title: Date
startDateFrom.description: Beginning of the range for start date subject courses.

startDateTo.title: Date
startDateTo.description: End of the range for start date subject courses.

lmsIndicator.description:
Is the entity to be created in the LMS.
If not specified, then the value of the LMS indicator is disregarded in the filtering.

pageNumber.title: Int32
pageNumber.description: The number of the page to return (1 is the first page).

inlineCount.title: Boolean
inlineCount.description: A flag indicating if total number of items should be included.

schoolCode.title: String
schoolCode.description: The school code for which to get data.

externalLessonId.title: String
externalLessonId.description: External identifier set by partners to allow them to match it with the lessons known by them.

subjectCourseId.title: Guid
subjectCourseId.description: Reference to the subject course that lesson is part of.

roomId.description:
Obsolete!
Reference to the room where lesson is conducted.
Use RoomIds instead of RoomId. RoomId will be removed in a future update.

roomIds.description: The ids of the rooms where the lesson is conducted.

Bearer.name: Authorization
Bearer.description: JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme. Example: "Authorization: Bearer {token}"
